languages.text: "Когда-нибудь они все падут пред священным огнем. Но пока надо довольствоваться тем, что враги Терры уничтожают друг друга".
"One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."
languages.original_text: "Когда-нибудь они все падут пред священным огнем. Но пока надо довольствоваться тем, что враги Терры уничтожают друг друга".

traits.locale_text: "One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."
"One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."
"One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."
"One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."
"One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."

languages.text: 「いつか、彼ら全ては聖なる炎の前に滅びます。今のところは、地球の敵を破滅させたことに満足していいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."

traits.locale_text: 「いつか、彼ら全ては聖なる炎の前に滅びます。今のところは、地球の敵を破滅させたことに満足していいでしょう」

languages.text: “总有一天，他们都会被神圣之火化为灰烬。至于现在，我们可以暂时好好欣赏泰拉之敌自相残杀的景象。”
languages.original_text: "One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."

traits.locale_text: “总有一天，他们都会被神圣之火化为灰烬。至于现在，我们可以暂时好好欣赏泰拉之敌自相残杀的景象。”

languages.text: "Eines Tages werden sie alle der heiligen Flamme zum Opfer fallen. Vorerst können wir zufrieden damit sein, dass die Feinde von Terra sich gegenseitig vernichten."
languages.original_text: "One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages werden sie alle der heiligen Flamme zum Opfer fallen. Vorerst können wir zufrieden damit sein, dass die Feinde von Terra sich gegenseitig vernichten."

languages.text: « Le jour venu, tous se soumettront devant la flamme sacrée. En attendant, contentons-nous de voir les ennemis de Terra s'entretuer. »
languages.original_text: "One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."

traits.locale_text: « Le jour venu, tous se soumettront devant la flamme sacrée. En attendant, contentons-nous de voir les ennemis de Terra s'entretuer. »

languages.text: «Algún día todos caerán ante la llama sagrada. De momento nos contentamos con hacer que los enemigos de Terra se destruyan mutuamente».
languages.original_text: "One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."

traits.locale_text: «Algún día todos caerán ante la llama sagrada. De momento nos contentamos con hacer que los enemigos de Terra se destruyan mutuamente».

languages.text: "Günün birinde... Kutsal alev karşısında hepsi birer birer düşecek. Şimdilik Terra'nın hasımlarının birbirini yok etmesinin tadını çıkarabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "One day, they will all fall before the sacred flame. For now, we can be satisfied with having enemies of Terra destroy one another."

traits.locale_text: "Günün birinde... Kutsal alev karşısında hepsi birer birer düşecek. Şimdilik Terra'nın hasımlarının birbirini yok etmesinin tadını çıkarabiliriz."
